name: Ninja Cut!
description:
One hit kills, that is the world of ninjas
Refreshing game is coming.

You will become a ninja, your purpose is only one,
That is to knock down all the enemies in front of you.
Our principle is to use one cut, never use the second cut.

Gameplay
1. The player defeats the enemy with a single blow through the line of play
2. There are not many mobile phones, so you have to learn to find the right opportunities
